mapper.sql: SELECT scheduleno, chatno, title, content, startdate, enddate, departtime FROM GroupSchedule
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GroupSchedule (chatno, title, content, startdate, enddate, departtime) VALUES (#{chatNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{departTime})
mapper.select: SELECT gs.scheduleno, gs.chatno, gs.title, gs.content, gs.startdate, gs.enddate, gs.departtime FROM GroupSchedule gs INNER JOIN GroupChat gc ON gs.chatno = gc.chatno INNER JOIN GroupChatStatement gcs on gc.chatno = gcs.chatno INNER JOIN Member m on gcs.memberno = m.memberno where m.memberid = #{memberId}
